title: The Draco Tavern
description: Bartender Rick Shumann at his Siberian tavern catering to aliens, narrates 26 tales include:"The Subject Is Closed" - Could AI stop working on life after death because subject solved? "Table Manners" - Is Rick hunter or hunted by five Folk aliens? "Losing Mars" - Unpublished. Aliens on Mars angry humans forget their planet.
author: Larry Niven
